name: syndicate
description: A web-based RSS aggregator and reader.  ## Maintainer - Dominick DeLorenzo [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dominick-delorenzo-breed) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/bad_mr_wolf) | [Github](https://github.com/domdelorenzo)

scripts.build: npm install && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && cd frontend && rm -rf build && npm install && npm run build
